description: There seems to be a new gang of troublemakers lurking around lately. A notorious group of young men committing a string of crimes throughout the neighborhoods. Led by their notorious leader, Joey Hard, the House Bangers, as they call themselves, have shown no restraint. It seems that what these misguided youths get off on is breaking into your house and then getting off all over your couch, each other, the carpet, the family pet- whatever you got. Oh, the depravity! And if that wasn't enough, they also apparently film the whole thing for repeated viewing enjoyment. Lucky you!Enjoy!
series: NDT - 8074 - Joey Hard, Noah Brooks, Jay Dubbs, Landon Terry
title: House Bangers
